mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1;
SELECT order_id, order_num, order_time, destination, box_state, progress_state, product_id, pallet_id FROM `order` ORDER BY order_time ASC, order_id ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE (destination = #{destination} OR #{destination} IS NULL) ORDER BY order_id ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE order_time BETWEEN COALESCE(#{startOfDay}, '2000-01-01 00:00:00') AND COALESCE(#{endOfDay}, '2100-12-31 23:59:59') ORDER BY order_id ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE (destination = #{destination} OR #{destination} IS NULL) AND order_time BETWEEN COALESCE(#{startOfDay}, '2000-01-01 00:00:00') AND COALESCE(#{endOfDay}, '2100-12-31 23:59:59') ORDER BY order_id ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT * FROM `order` WHERE (#{destination} IS NULL OR destination = #{destination}) AND (#{startOfDay} IS NULL OR order_time BETWEEN #{startOfDay} AND #{endOfDay}) ORDER BY order_time DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE order_time BETWEEN #{startOfDay} AND #{endOfDay};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (order_num, order_time, destination, box_state, progress_state, product_id, pallet_id) VALUES (#{order_num}, #{order_time}, #{destination}, #{box_state}, #{progress_state}, #{product_id}, #{pallet_id});
